item.title: Atcoder beginner solutions(C++ version)
item.description: Only for reference, they are not best solutions. ABC086A - Product #include <iostream>using namespace std; int main(){ int a, b; cin>>a>>b; if(a % 2 == 1 && b % 2 == 1){ cout<<"Odd"<<endl; }else{ cout<<"Even"<<endl; } return 0; } 2.ABC081A - Placing Marbles #include <iostream>using namespace std; int main(){ string a; cin>>a; int ret = 0; for(auto x : a){ if(x == '1'){ ret++; } } cout<<ret<<endl; return 0; }
